Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Combat

Fan The Hammer: May shoot up to 6 shots in one action at -4; a roll of 1 or 2 may hit a bystander
Harrowed: Ignores non-head Called Shot damage/Doesn't bleed out/Killed only if brain is destroyed/Immune to disease and poison
Pacifist+: Will not fight living creatures; uses nonlethal methods only in defense
